Class UIUtils

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.ui.UIUtils
public class UIUtils extends Object
Utility class providing common UI methods used across the application

    • showConfirmationAlert

      public static boolean showConfirmationAlert(String title, String message)
      Shows a confirmation dialog and returns whether the user confirmed
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert
      message - the message to display
      Returns:
      true if the user confirmed, false otherwise

    • showConfirmationDialog

      public static boolean showConfirmationDialog(String title, String message, String confirmText, String cancelText)
      Shows a confirmation dialog with custom button text
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the alert
      message - the message to display
      confirmText - the text for the confirm button
      cancelText - the text for the cancel button
      Returns:
      true if the user confirmed, false otherwise

    • createStyledButton

      public static javafx.scene.control.Button createStyledButton(String text, String color)
      Creates a styled button with custom background color
      Parameters:
      text - the text to display on the button
      color - the background color as a hex string (e.g., "#00FF7F")
      Returns:
      the styled button

    • createMenuButton

      public static javafx.scene.control.Button createMenuButton(String text)
      Creates a menu button with hover effects
      Parameters:
      text - the text to display on the button
      Returns:
      the menu button

    • showNonModalConfirmation

      public static boolean showNonModalConfirmation(String title, String message, String confirmButtonText, String cancelButtonText)
      Shows a custom non-modal confirmation dialog that doesn't close parent dialogs
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the dialog
      message - The message to display
      confirmButtonText - Text for the confirm button
      cancelButtonText - Text for the cancel button
      Returns:
      true if confirmed, false otherwise
